thread.section_title: RC Willey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Willey | rcwilley.com | 8 of 150
thread.title: Veronica

author: Veronica
title: Veronica
text: I bought furniture online for my daughter. I received an email about the delivery which said she needed to show a valid ID and present the card that was used to purchase the furniture. Well, she didn't have the card, I did, and I was 330 miles away. I called their customer service number and I was transferred to a gentleman named Brian. Within 30 seconds, everything was sorted out and my daughter's furniture was delivered without incident. Truly the easy furniture buying experience I've ever had!
